burlap.oomdp.stochasticgames.common

Class StaticRepeatedGameActionModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • burlap.oomdp.stochasticgames.JointActionModel
      • burlap.oomdp.stochasticgames.common.StaticRepeatedGameActionModel

  • public class StaticRepeatedGameActionModel
extends JointActionModel
    This action model can be used to take a single stage game, and cause it to repeat itself. This is achieved by simply having the same state returned after each joint action.
    Author:
    James MacGlashan

    • Method Detail

      • transitionProbsFor

        public java.util.List<TransitionProbability> transitionProbsFor(State s,
                                                       JointAction ja)
        Description copied from class: JointActionModel
        Returns the transition probabilities for applying the provided JointAction action in the given state. Transition probabilities are specified as list of TransitionProbability objects. The list is only required to contain transitions with non-zero probability.
        Specified by:
        transitionProbsFor in class JointActionModel
        Parameters:
        s - the state in which the joint action is performed
        ja - the joint action performed
        Returns:
        a list of state TransitionProbability objects.

      • actionHelper

        protected State actionHelper(State s,
                 JointAction ja)
        Description copied from class: JointActionModel
        This method is what determines the state when JointAction ja is executed in State s. The input state should be directly modified.
        Specified by:
        actionHelper in class JointActionModel
        Parameters:
        s - the state in which the joint action is performed.
        ja - the joint action to be performed.
        Returns:
        the resulting state of applying this action.
